name: HIX: Puzzle Islands
description:
Help the godlike Hix restore his islands, after his devilish brother Dix has made a mess of things.

Swap land tiles to reconnect all roads and rivers to their original start and end points. Connect all the puzzle pieces in the right way, and you will see the islands spring back to life!

Game features:
- 180 puzzle levels
- 6 differently themed worlds
- Simple but satisfying gameplay
- Varying difficulties, choose what fits best
- Unlimited time and optional hints, so no stress
- No ads or In-App purchases

As you make your way through multiple, differently themed worlds, you will also be able to recover some of Hix’s stolen belongings. And who knows, maybe you will even be able to reforge the brotherly bond that was broken.

Awarded by Pocket Gamer - Big Indie Pitch: 'Highly polished game with a lot of charm, well-made mechanics, and a strong core!'

Have fun!
